title: Allspring Global CEO on Launching ETFs, Private Credit
description: Kate Burke, CEO of Allspring Global Investments, says most individual investors will continue to keep the bulk of their allocations in public markets. She tells Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close” that Allspring is focused on strengthening its core investment teams rather than chasing new areas. (Source: Bloomberg)
